column5: I just got back from sharpstone lake. Fishing was excellent. Most walleye were 20-24in. on average. Largest of the trip was a 27 in. Mostly in 13-18ft. of water jigging and trolling. Halley's has a camp there I didn't stay there, but I would recommend them over where I had stayed " It was a dump." Caught hundreds of fish for the week. There were 5 of us.
hey tony, we are booked at sharpstone halleys camp aug of 09. where did you stay? any tips?
